Header.title: Plumbing done right. Guaranteed
Header.paragraph: With over 20 years of experience, PR Plumbingâ€™s certified professionals deliver small company values with large scale capabilities.

About.paragraph: In an industry that depends on reliability and expertise, PR Plumbing promises to deliver plumbing services done right. Our licenced plumbers offer over 20 years of success working within a broad range of facilities to provide the highest levels of quality control and workmanship. Alongside large scale success providing services to commercial retail stores, industrial complexes and beyond, PR Plumbing encapsulates small business values through its family owned and operated business roots.

Services.name: Building & Property Maintenance
Services.text: With experience ranging from residential properties and extending to heritage listed buildings, ensure your structural integrity with PR Plumbing.

Services.name: Hot Water Heater Repair & Replacement
Services.text: Keeping up with industry standards and best practice, receive professional advice and services on the solutions best suited to you.

Features.title: Commercial
Features.text: Small company values and large scale capabilities don't have to be mutually exclusive. PR Plumbing enters into commercial projects with a deep understanding of the various complexities posed by commercial work ranging from interconnected pipes spanning various levels to vast plumbing systems including sewers, pipes and industrial grade boilers. PR Plumbing provides the expertise required for specialised commercial jobs including maintenance, repairs, and installations.

Features.title: Residential
Features.text: No job is too big or small. From single level to multi-story buildings, PR Plumbing has expertise across the vast spectrum of residential sites including plumbing, drainage and gas.

Features.title: Industrial
Features.text: From the Ferrero Chocolate Factory to Tahmoor Mines, PR Plumbing has worked on plumbing projects on an industrial scale. Our industrial services span from connecting pumps and silos to repair work on machinery.

Features.title: Civil
Features.text: Civil plumbing projects involve more comprehensive jobs that require specialised knowledge and expertise. Among PR Plumbing's experience with civil jobs, a recent project undertaken in Newcastle required collaboration with private developers and local Council in order to service storm water mains and infrastructure under local streets and roads.
